S

Save - Class in Challenge
This class is used to save the game state each tick to ensure Player progress is never lost.
Save() - Constructor for class Challenge.Save
Constructor (if needed)
saveFile(Level, User) - Method in class Challenge.Save
Saves the current Level to a file
saveProfile(User) - Method in class Challenge.Save
Saves the user profile of the current user playing
scene - Static variable in class Challenge.GUI
The start method, this will initialise the program
setCellGrid(Cell[][]) - Method in class Challenge.Level
Sets the cell grid
setDirection(int) - Method in class Challenge.Enemy
Sets the direction of the enemy.
setEntityGrid(Entity[][]) - Method in class Challenge.Level
Sets the entity grid
setGameStatus() - Method in class Challenge.Player
Resets the game status
setPassable() - Method in class Challenge.Cell
Changes a cells Passable state
setScores(ArrayList<Integer>) - Method in class Challenge.User
Setter to set the level scores for the User
setTokenCount(int) - Method in class Challenge.Player
Used to set the Player Token count
SmartEnemy - Class in Challenge
A Smart Enemy is able to calculate the best path to the player ane take appropriate moves in order to chase the player around the map, they can backtrack if no path to the player is not available.
SmartEnemy(Position, int) - Constructor for class Challenge.SmartEnemy
Constructs an smart enemy
SpriteConverter - Class in Challenge
SpriteConverter is an abstract class used to edit sprites before they are rendered into the game, resizing and rotating etc
SpriteConverter() - Constructor for class Challenge.SpriteConverter
 
start(Stage) - Method in class Challenge.Main
Start the thing!
START_TIME - Static variable in class Challenge.GUI
The start time for a level
